South Carolina Democratic Congressman James Clyburn was quick to proclaim: I think so. Look, I lived through the 50s and the 60s... We've got to really be very, very concerned about how we say things and the things that we do say and how that may impact people. Democratic New York Senator Kirsten Gillibrand chimed in:`` We may never know what motivated him to commit these heinous crimes, but what we do know is that the climate of debate has degraded so significantly,
